subject: Soccer

World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The former American captain thinks he knows what Luis Suárez and Thomas Müller are feeling, sitting out the semifinals of the World Cup because of card suspensions.
snippet: The former American captain thinks he knows what Luis Suárez and Thomas Müller are feeling, sitting out the semifinals of the World Cup because of card suspensions.
